name: Sleep Escape
description:
Sleep Escape is a 2D platformer in which you are trying to get to the bed at the end to complete various levels!

UNLOCK MULTIPLE CHARACTERS - Using in-game currency, you can unlock a variety of characters of different styles!

CHALLENGING OBSTACLES - With multiple different obstacles in a multitude of levels, you will have a hard time getting by!

CHARACTER BOOST - Depending on the character you choose, you can either run faster or jump higher!

CONTROLS - A, D (move) SPACE (jump) ESC (pause menu)

(Game ported from mobile to PC, so screenshots are slightly different than game)

Powered by Unity.
